full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 40 of 262 1745 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct 1 A. Tony drove. 2 Q. Where was Jeffrey Epstein's house? 3 A. El Brillo Way on Palm Beach Island. 4 Q. At that time where were you and Carolyn living, in what town? 5 6 A. West Palm Beach. 7 Q. What's the difference between Palm Beach and West Palm Beach? 8 9 A. Money is no object out there. Money doesn't -- everybody -- 10 11 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I'm going to object to this as lacking foundation. 602. 12 13 THE COURT: Sustained. 14 Could I ask you to move closer to the mic when you talk, but wait for the next question. 15 16 THE WITNESS: Yes, ma'am. 17 BY MS. COMEY: 18 Q. How long did you live in the West Palm Beach area? 19 A. Pretty much all my life. 20 Q. And how often did you go to Palm Beach when you lived in West Palm Beach? 21 22 A. Very rarely. 23 Q. Why did you go there very rarely? 24 A. I didn't have enough money to buy anything at the gas station. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013318
